channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The Time Warper & The Clock Master , The Technician & The Hacker
channel.description:
> # [color=steblue]The Time Warper[/color] :shield: > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Delay)** - All actions against players will be delayed by 1 night. Actions will be shown as they've succeeded. > > **Day Ability (Back To The Present)** - Make a player **Immune to Death** tonight.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Denounce)** - Make a player Immune to **Delay**'s effects.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into:** > > # [color=purple]The Clock Master[/color] :shield: > **[color=purple]Unseen Support[/color]** > > **Passive (Delay)** - All actions against players will be delayed by 1 night. Actions will be shown as they've succeeded. > > **Night Ability (Denounce)** - Make a player Immune to **Delay**'s effects.(Infinite Uses) > **Night Ability (Shattered Time)** - Only **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** will be able to visit your target tonight.(1 Use) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*
> # [color=steblue]The Technician[/color] :shield: > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Hard Work)** - You will be Immune to Death tonight.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Fuse)** - Anyone attempting to occupy/redirect yourself or your target will be killed.(Infinite Uses - Will not work if the target is **Occupy Immune**/**Redirection Immune** - Can NOT Target the King) > **Night Ability (Fearless)** - If you die tonight , your killer will be occupied the next night.(1 Use) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**/**[color=darkred]The Cult[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.* > > **[color=purple]Converts[/color] into:** > > # [color=purple]The Hacker[/color] :shield: > **[color=purple]Unseen Offensive[/color]** > > **Day Ability (Hacked!)** - Disable a player's abilities tonight.(1 Use) > > **Night Ability (Deflected)** - Make a player target themselves.(3 Uses - Does NOT Bypass Redirection Immunity.) > **Night Ability (Watchdog)** - If your target visits you tonight , they will be occupied.(Infinite Uses) > **Goal:** *Defeat **[color=steblue]The Blue Dragon[/color]** and any **[color=gray]Neutrals[/color]** that seek you harm.*

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Time Warper & The Clock Master , The Technician & The Hacker
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
It was kind of necessary as I wanted to experiment with a trial manipulator and a log neighbourizer but at the same time if too many of these classes spawn then the game becomes to easy to solve, which is why I made them unique and impossible to spawn together. Additionally, I would also put Prestige on the Mystic.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Time Warper & The Clock Master , The Technician & The Hacker
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
If you’re talking about my classes, then I added it as the classes they were on were too easily confirm-able due to being social ones and to prevent too many easily confirmed classes from spawning at once, since yours aren’t as easily confirmed then they don’t technically need them.

Read full topic

item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Time Warper & The Clock Master , The Technician & The Hacker

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Time Warper & The Clock Master , The Technician & The Hacker
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Time Warper

Blue Dragon Support

Passive (Delay) - All actions against players will be delayed by 1 night. Actions will be shown as they’ve succeeded.

Day Ability (Back To The Present) - Make a player Immune to Death tonight.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Denounce) - Make a player Immune to Delay’s effects.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Clock Master

Unseen Support

Passive (Delay) - All actions against players will be delayed by 1 night. Actions will be shown as they’ve succeeded.

Night Ability (Denounce) - Make a player Immune to Delay’s effects.(Infinite Uses)
Night Ability (Shattered Time) - Only The Unseen will be able to visit your target tonight.(1 Use)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

The Technician

Blue Dragon Support

Day Ability (Hard Work) - You will be Immune to Death tonight.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Fuse) - Anyone attempting to occupy/redirect yourself or your target will be killed.(Infinite Uses - Will not work if the target is Occupy Immune/Redirection Immune - Can NOT Target the King)
Night Ability (Fearless) - If you die tonight , your killer will be occupied the next night.(1 Use)
Goal: Defeat The Unseen/The Cult and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Converts into:

The Hacker

Unseen Offensive

Day Ability (Hacked!) - Disable a player’s abilities tonight.(1 Use)

Night Ability (Deflected) - Make a player target themselves.(3 Uses - Does NOT Bypass Redirection Immunity.)
Night Ability (Watchdog) - If your target visits you tonight , they will be occupied.(Infinite Uses)
Goal: Defeat The Blue Dragon and any Neutrals that seek you harm.

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion]The Time Warper & The Clock Master , The Technician & The Hacker
